A roundup of websites, techniques & general good stuff that I've discovered around the web. This roundup includes NB Signs, Progression.js, Pizza Time Hovers, Hair & Modal Window Effects.

  • NB Signs

    New Bohemia Signs is a sign writing company based in San Francisco, specialising in hand painted signs. Their website, Instagram & Flickr has a large collection of signs and is a good inspiration.

    View

  • Progression.js

    A jQuery plugin created by Aaron Lumsden that gives users real time hints & progress updates as they complete forms.

    View

  • Pizza Time Hovers

    An interesting CSS Tricks article on multi-step transitional hovers, showing you what's possible. Inspired by the hovers on pizzatime.com

    View

  • Hair by Mathias Paumgarten

    Impressive interactive hair demo by Mathias Paumgarten. Control panel lets you adjust the amount of hair, thickness & length. Demo's on CodePen so you can check out the code.

    View

  • Modal Window Effects

    Codrops article/demo's on Modal Window Effects, giving you ideas on how you can transition the windows in.

    View
